title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop! This revolutionary cleaning tool is designed to tackle all your hard floors and area rugs with ease. Its sleek black design, model number 2554A, adds a touch of elegance to your cleaning routine.

Featuring a rotating brush system, this powerful cleaner effortlessly lifts away dirt and grime from your floors. The wide cleaning path width of 10.5 inches ensures that no spot is left untouched. With its swivel head and carry handle, maneuvering around furniture and other obstacles is a breeze.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is not only convenient but also efficient. Its cordless design allows for hassle-free cleaning without any limitations. Powered by a 36V Lithium-Ion battery, it provides up to 30 minutes of cleaning time, giving you plenty of time to tackle multiple rooms.

Say goodbye to pet hair and messes! The improved edge cleaning technology ensures that every corner and edge is thoroughly cleaned. Plus, with the support of the BISSELL Pet Foundation, your purchase contributes to a great cause.

This all-in-one cleaning solution is compatible with a variety of surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs. It even comes with two multi-surface trial formulas, two hard floor sanitize trial formulas, and two multi-surface brush rolls, so you can start cleaning right away.

Connectivity is key in today's world, and the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max has got you covered. With its WiFi connected capabilities and BISSELL Connect app compatibility, you can easily control and monitor your cleaning sessions from your smartphone.

Worried about cleaning the cleaner? Don't be! The self-cleaning cycle ensures that the brush system stays fresh and ready for your next cleaning session. And with the two-tank technology, clean water and dirt are kept separate for optimal cleaning performance.

Experience the ultimate cleaning convenience with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. With its powerful features, sleek design, and charitable support, this is a must-have for every home. Don't miss out on this game-changing cleaning solution!

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, the ultimate cleaning solution for your hard floors and area rugs. This sleek and powerful cleaning tool is designed to make your life easier and your floors spotless.

Featuring a rotating brush system, the BISSELL CrossWave effortlessly picks up dirt and debris, leaving your floors looking pristine. With a cleaning path width of 10.5 inches and a swivel head, you can easily maneuver around furniture and reach every corner of your home.

Say goodbye to messy cords! The cordless design allows you to clean without any limitations, giving you the freedom to move around your home with ease. Powered by a 36V Lithium-Ion battery, the BISSELL CrossWave provides up to 30 minutes of continuous cleaning power, ensuring that no mess is left behind.

Not only does the BISSELL CrossWave excel in performance, but it also supports a great cause. With every purchase, you are contributing to the BISSELL Pet Foundation, making a positive impact on the lives of pets in need.

The BISSELL CrossWave is compatible with a wide range of surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs. It even comes with 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls, providing everything you need to achieve a deep clean.

Experience the convenience of a self-cleaning cycle and improved edge cleaning, ensuring that every nook and cranny is thoroughly cleaned. The two-tank technology keeps clean and dirty water separate, ensuring a hygienic and efficient cleaning process.

Connectivity is made easy with the BISSELL Connect app, allowing you to control and monitor your cleaning from your smartphone. With Wi-Fi connected capabilities, you can enjoy a seamless cleaning experience.

Choose the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop and revolutionize your cleaning routine. With its advanced features, exceptional performance, and support for a worthy cause, this cleaning powerhouse is a must-have for any home.
